select t.serviceDetailName, t.serverNum, (case when y.serverNum is null then 0 else y.serverNum end) as yserverNum from ( SELECT os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' AS serviceDetailName, sum(os.service_detail->'$.serverNum') AS serverNum FROM order_service os LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_id = os.order_id WHERE (os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' is not null and os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' != '') AND (os.service_detail->'$.serverNum' is not NULL and os.service_detail->'$.serverNum' != '') AND oi.order_status not like '%取消' AND (to_days(oi.server_complete_time) = to_days(now())) group by os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' ORDER BY sum(os.service_detail->'$.serverNum') DESC ) t left join ( SELECT os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' AS serviceDetailName, sum(os.service_detail->'$.serverNum') AS serverNum FROM order_service os LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_id = os.order_id WHERE (os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' is not null and os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' != '') AND (os.service_detail->'$.serverNum' is not NULL and os.service_detail->'$.serverNum' != '') AND oi.order_status not like '%取消' AND (TO_DAYS(oi.server_complete_time) - TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) >= -1) group by os.service_detail->>'$.serviceDetailName' ORDER BY sum(os.service_detail->'$.serverNum') DESC
) y on t.serviceDetailName = y.serviceDetailName
